scripts.dev: npm run dev --w=@web3modal/core & npm run dev --w=@web3modal/ui & npm run dev --w=@web3modal/ethereum & npm run dev --w=@web3modal/react
scripts.pre-publish: npm run lint; npm run typecheck; npm run prettier; npm run build; npm run new-version
scripts.npm-publish:rc: lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag rc
scripts.npm-publish:latest: lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag latest
scripts.npm-publish:next: lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag next
scripts.npm-publish:canary: lerna exec -- npm publish --no-private --access public --tag canary
